thread.title: Mark Gaier
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Mark Gaier

author: Mark Gaier
title: Mark Gaier
text: I had ordered a helmet from another store. Before the helmet came I saw the same model I wanted at STG for $50 less. Sent that other helmet back and ordered from STG. Have since ordered a few more items and in the future this is the only place I will shop for my cycle gear. 5 Stars.
